channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 美国公司正在裁员。您是否受到了影响？分享您的裁员经历和应对方法
item.description:
Companies in the US are laying off workers. Have you been impacted? Share your layoff experience and how you’re coping https://t.co/gKhf5TtoZj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 仅在 10 个月前，英国在投资者眼中还是一潭死水。现在，人们越来越乐观，认为英国即将反弹
item.description:
The UK looked like a basket case to investors just 10 months ago.

Now, optimism is growing that the country is about to bounce back https://t.co/ATqVmjjxZu

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 黄金跃升至历史新高，因对美联储转向的猜测和地缘政治风险支撑其涨势
item.description:
Gold jumps to an all-time high, as speculation over a Federal Reserve pivot and geopolitical risks underpin its rally https://t.co/VvVIBlpQuZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 今年早些时候，西班牙血浆公司 Grifols 遭到空头攻击后，分析师们大多支持该公司。现在他们开始失去信心
item.description:
After a short seller attack earlier this year, analysts mostly stood behind Spanish blood plasma firm Grifols. Now they’re starting to lose faith https://t.co/L518utOL2v

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 在遭到尼日利亚政府抨击后，Binance 将停止对尼日利亚奈拉交易的所有支持
item.description:
Binance will halt all support for trading using Nigeria’s naira, after coming under fire from the country’s government https://t.co/apaBgjrXzZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 根据彭博社对最新联邦数据的分析，越来越多的美国小型学院面临压力，这些数据显示，更多的高等教育机构面临入学率下降和其他方面的压力。
item.description:
A growing number of small US colleges are under pressure, according to a Bloomberg analysis of the latest federal data that shows more higher education institutions facing enrollment declines and other strains. https://t.co/ppMFawW4b4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: @GearoidReidy（通过 @观点）说，日本股市正在刷新纪录，新的免税投资账户让该国的年轻人希望购买股票。它需要让只买一只股票变得更容易
item.description:
Japan stocks are breaking records and a new tax-free investment account has the country's youth looking to buy shares, says @GearoidReidy (via @opinion). It needs to make it easier to buy just one https://t.co/HiGEzOkp0V

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 企业家第一 "组织首席执行官马特-克利福德（Matt Clifford）表示，全球投资者对英国充满信心。
item.description:
Global investors are reporting a new sense of confidence in the UK

The "obvious" starting point for positivity around Britain is talent, says Matt Clifford, CEO of Entrepreneur First https://t.co/pWPJZXbew0 pic.twitter.com/gdAEaoIZ5p

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 美国制裁津巴布韦总统姆南加古瓦，其修复国家的承诺化为乌有
item.description:
The US has santioned Zimbabwean President Mnangagwa, whose pledge to fix his country has come to nothing https://t.co/Tey0ZfyFdU

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 英国股票毫无疑问是便宜的，投资分析师和机会主义掠夺者最近都经常证实这一点。但是，对整体经济的乐观情绪是否会帮助投资者重返市场呢？
item.description:
UK stocks are unquestionably cheap, as confirmed regularly these days by both investment analysts and opportunistic predators. But will signs of improving sentiment towards the broader economy help bring investors back to the market? https://t.co/BEC0XIe1Id

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 即将于本周在法兰克福召开会议的欧洲央行官员们可以放心了：根据彭博经济公司的通胀 Nowcast 预测，欧洲央行已经实现了 2% 的目标
item.description:
ECB officials about to meet in Frankfurt this week can take heart: according to the Bloomberg Economics inflation Nowcast, they’ve already reached their 2% target https://t.co/QVatGZDDTk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 世界第二大经济体希望清洁能源，但尚未放弃廉价化石燃料，@苍西之写道
item.description:
The world’s No. 2 economy wants to clean up, but isn’t letting go of cheap fossil fuels just yet, writes @cangsizhi https://t.co/fb4FArBZ47

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）称，随着企业信心的恢复和经济增长的保持，今年全球并购将猛增 50
item.description:
Global mergers and acquisitions will jump 50% this year as corporate confidence recovers and economic growth holds up, according to Morgan Stanley https://t.co/uuYgJ5N6iy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 目前，美国家庭为其他债务（从信用卡到学生贷款）支付的利息与为抵押贷款支付的利息大致相同
item.description:
US households are now paying roughly as much interest on other kinds of debt, from credit cards to student loans, as they are on their mortgages https://t.co/E7eo6ppAYk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 新消息："英镑是欧洲的美元"，全球投资者正在改变对英国的看法--一些投资者预测，英镑的良好走势将使其在今年年底达到 1.37 美元。
item.description:
NEW: "The pound is the US dollar of Europe"

Global investors are changing their minds about Britain — with some predicting the pound's good run could see it hit $1.37 by the end of the year https://t.co/WguFiYM4ba pic.twitter.com/UI47S59LVz

— Bloomberg UK (@BloombergUK) March 5, 2024

item.title: 伦敦金属交易所称，所谓的 "绿色镍 "市场规模太小，不足以形成自己的期货合约，这对希望获得金属溢价的矿商来说是个打击
item.description:
The London Metal Exchange says that the market for so-called “green nickel” was too small to warrant its own futures contract, a blow to miners hoping to secure a premium for their metal https://t.co/RlZbw7Sx44

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 韩国造船厂未售出的液化天然气破冰船有可能推迟俄罗斯促进碳氢化合物出口的北极项目。
item.description:
Unsold LNG icebreakers sitting in a South Korean shipyard threaten to delay an Arctic project central to Russia's efforts to boost hydrocarbon exports https://t.co/VRbYNkUC6i

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: Sibanye Stillwater 报告亏损 20 亿美元，此前这家南非矿业公司对其美国钯矿进行了减值处理
item.description:
Sibanye Stillwater reported a $2 billion loss, after the South Africa mining company took an impairment against its US palladium mine https://t.co/x5ShRmtYEh

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 欧盟将拨出 15 亿欧元用于促进集团国防工业的发展，但这一提议可能会遭到对布鲁塞尔攫取过多权力持谨慎态度的国家的反对。
item.description:
The EU is setting aside an initial €1.5 billion to boost the bloc’s defense industry, in a proposal that could face pushback from nations wary of Brussels grabbing too much power https://t.co/dXNvHlDBta

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 认为您能比英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）做得更好吗？我们的彭博预算游戏让您掌管英国的钱财 我们的记者乔-梅耶斯玩了这个游戏......结果并不尽如人意 ➡️
item.description:
Think you could do a better job than Chancellor Jeremy Hunt?

Our Bloomberg Budget Game puts you in charge of the UK's money

Our reporter Joe Mayes plays the game... and it doesn't quite go to plan ➡️ https://t.co/il0p0KPxj5 pic.twitter.com/0keiRabwXY

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 杰伊-鲍威尔（Jay Powell）明天将发表讲话，金融市场可能会对他的每一句话都拭目以待。大卫-罗森伯格告诉我们应该注意什么。立即收看彭博监控广播的 @EconguyRosie 直播。在 YouTube 上加入 @TomKeene @PTSweeney @LisaMateoTV 的行列：
item.description:
Jay Powell speaks tomorrow and financial markets will likely hang on every word.
David Rosenberg tells us what to listen for. Watch @EconguyRosie LIVE on Bloomberg Surveillance Radio right now.
Join @TomKeene @PTSweeney @LisaMateoTV on YouTube: https://t.co/sfcoNFAvHA

— Bloomberg Radio (@BloombergRadio) March 5, 2024

item.title: 西班牙要求欧盟对俄罗斯的液化天然气进口采取更强硬的立场，确保各国能够阻止进口，而不会将货物转运到邻国
